meaningMnemonic: You’ve got a <radical>winter</radical> with lots of <radical>ice</radical>. But doesn't any winter have lots of ice? Exactly. That's why this is just <kanji>winter</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Winter</kanji> is also the time of year you give out presents: "One fu' you, one fu' you and… one <reading>fu' you</reading> (ふゆ)!"
